body: I don't quit understand why the import epw component keeps showing this warning even if  ladybug is already flying... I know that Disable and Enable the component is a solution. But it is frustrating to do this every time the GH file is open... Pls kindly advise! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/NQs0dYxvfMUvt*SpUEimXh5QWvYdeivFCbvtZzBGhB8y2-aMoPp8*JDWbOPWVE4B1kMCajHifg0B3dxcDZnDVXD68C3bjpL5/Picture1.png)
topic: import epw asks to "let ladybug fly" although LB is already flying...

replies.body:
Do ctrl+B to send it to the back, so it will be executed before other components next time you open the file.

-A.
